channel.title: Reversing flow control obfuscation
channel.description:
I was investigating .net obfuscation techniques (.net reflector is awesome) and came across this simple, but possibly helpful post for those who might be interested. I can't vouch for the validity or effectiveness with java, but I figured some of you might find it interesting.
http://jithook.blogspot.co.uk/2008/04/abount-flow-control-obfuscation-of.html
